title: Growing Corn Basics Time Lapse - 6 days

tasks.task: Cross a dirt road by walking along it and stepping on the dirt to move forward.
subtasks: Walk along the dirt road.
Place one foot on the dirt surface.
Lift the other foot and move it forward.
Repeat with the other foot to maintain forward movement.

tasks.task: Stop a combine by turning off its engine.
subtasks: Identify the combine's engine.
Operate the switch or lever to turn off the engine.

tasks.task: Use a sewing machine to stitch together burlap or canvas.
subtasks: Position the fabric on the sewing machine's foot pedal.
Foot pedal the sewing machine to stitch the fabric.

tasks.task: Load a wheelbarrow with manure or dirt.
subtasks: Approach a wheelbarrow.
Scoop a shovelful of manure or dirt with a shovel.
Transfer the shovelful into the wheelbarrow.
Repeat until the wheelbarrow is filled.
Position the helper on the pivot arm.
Brace the pivot point with a pole or similar object.
Locate the fuel tank on the tractor.
Use a fuel hose or can to fill the tank.
Approach the combine's header.
Unlock the header adjustment mechanism.
Make necessary adjustments for the grain pickup.

tasks.task: Install a new fan belt on the combine.
subtasks: Locate the fan belt routing diagram.
Remove the old fan belt.
Install the new fan belt according to the diagram.

tasks.task: Drive a forklift to stack hay bales.
subtasks: Operate the forklift to pick up a hay bale.
Drive to the stacking location.
Lower the hay bale onto the stack.
Repeat with additional bales.

tasks.task: Manually turn a shaft to advance a hay baler cutter reel.
subtasks: Stand near the hay baler.
Grip the manually turned shaft.
Rotate the shaft to advance the cutter reel.

tasks.task: Clean the combine's air inlet using a shop vac.
subtasks: Position a shop vac near the combine.
Attach the vac hose to the air inlet.
Activate the vac to suction debris from the inlet.

tasks.task: Locate and stir compost in a wheelbarrow.
subtasks: Identify the compost pile.
Grasp a shovel or pitchfork.
Scoop compost into the wheelbarrow.
Stir the compost to mix it thoroughly.
